subject: John Lennon or George Harrison EVP's?
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text: Hi All, Just wondering about John's EVP's recently (Yes, bullet), and how it came to be known that it was John Lennon? Were there other EVP's he said, and what about George Harrison, has there been any attempts made to contact him or continue with John???  I hope so!!!  Thanks!  =Judy=
